column1: Master of Communication Sciences: Digital Media and Society (Leuven)
column5: From virtual worlds, social media and the use of AI technology to online gaming – digital media re-shape society in various domains and inform the way individual people live, think and act. The international Master of Communication Sciences: Digital Media and Society provides a one-year master programme in which you will study the nature, effect and meaning of digital
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
